oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Temporal filter based target detection and tracking using multiple filter bank
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ZAVERI, MA
MERCHANT, SN
DESAI, UB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: image sequences
optimization
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a method to detect multiple point sized targets in an image sequence using temporal mutliscale decomposition. The proposed method uses motion as a cue to detect target, which-is independent of any feature. Along with detection, a method is proposed to track maneuvering or non-maneuvering targets simultaneously using multiple filter bank approach in an image sequence. The switch-over between the filters is based on a single-step decision logic and consequently, is computationally more efficient, and performance wise more robust.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: 7TH WORLD MULTICONFERENCE ON SYSTEMICS, CYBERNETICS AND INFORMATICS, VOL IV, PROCEEDINGS: IMAGE, ACOUSTIC, SPEECH AND SIGNAL PROCESSING,275-279
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 7th World Multiconference on Systemics, Cybernetics and Informatics,ORLANDO, FL,JUL 27-30, 2003
